title: WritingSystem
description:
Writing System has a set of defined base elements or symbols, individually termed signs and collectively called a script, as well as a set of rules and conventions (orthography). 
Examples are Latin Script, Cyrillic Script or Greek Script. 
Norm is ISO 15924
Where possible the codes are derived from ISO 639-2 where the name of a script and the name of a language using the script are identical (example: Gujarati ISO 639 guj, ISO 15924 Gujr). Preference is given to the 639-2 Bibliographical codes, which is different from the otherwise often preferred use of the Terminological codes.

referenceDataId.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

iso4Code.title: alpha-4Code
iso4Code.description: The Alpha-4 Code according to ISO 15924.
